+//// File: src/routes/attendance.routes.ts
 import express from 'express';
 import {
   getAttendanceByFilters,
   markAttendance,

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -7,10 +7,10 @@
 import { authMiddleware } from '../middlewares/authMiddleware';
 
 const router = express.Router();
 
-               // Bulk attendance
+              
 
 
-router.get('/api/attendance/schedule/:scheduleId', authMiddleware, getAttendanceForSchedule); // Get attendance for a specific class
-router.post('/api/attendance', authMiddleware, markAttendance); // Mark attendance (bulk)
+router.get('/attendance/schedule/:scheduleId', authMiddleware, getAttendanceForSchedule); // Get attendance for a specific class
+router.post('/attendance', authMiddleware, markAttendance); // Mark attendance (bulk)
 export default router;

Index:

@@ -10,7 +10,7 @@
 
               
 
 
-router.get('/attendance/schedule/:scheduleId', authMiddleware, getAttendanceForSchedule); // Get attendance for a specific class
+router.get('/schedule/:scheduleId', authMiddleware, getAttendanceForSchedule); // Get attendance for a specific class
 router.post('/attendance', authMiddleware, markAttendance); // Mark attendance (bulk)
 export default router;

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -11,6 +11,6 @@
               
 
 
 router.get('/schedule/:scheduleId', authMiddleware, getAttendanceForSchedule); // Get attendance for a specific class
-router.post('/attendance', authMiddleware, markAttendance); // Mark attendance (bulk)
+router.post('/', authMiddleware, markAttendance); // Mark attendance (bulk)
 export default router;
